pages.text: Cotyledion is a filter feeding entoproct from the Cambrian Chenjiang lagerstatten. It was only a couple of centimeters in height, and had what looks to be a ring of tentacles on top of the head for catching prey. Originally having a dubious classification, new fossils showing a U shaped gut allow scientists to classify it as a stem group entoprocta.
